text: The Albania national U-20 basketball team, is the representative for Albania in international basketball competitions, and it is organized and run by the Albanian Basketball Association. The Albania national U-20 basketball team represents Albania at the FIBA Europe Under-20 Championship. ==Roster== |} | valign="top" | ; Head coach * \---- ;Legend: *Club – describes last club as of 19 July 2015 *Age – describes age as of 19 July 2015 |} ==References== U20 Category:National under-20 basketball teams
title: Albania men's national under-20 basketball team
